title: Gab and Juls: Xavi to Blame for El Clasico Loss?
description:
Gab Marcotti and Julien Laurens are joined by Alex Kirkland to discuss Real Madrid's 3-1 victory over Barcelona in El Clasico and the mistakes Xavi made in setting up his team. The guys also discuss the implications of Liverpool's 1-0 victory over Manchester City, whether Kylian Mbappe is truly forcing a move away from PSG, Arsenal's crucial win against Leeds United and praise Union Berlin after their 2-0 win over Borussia Dortmund.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Analyzing Xavi's tactics after Barcelona's  3-1 El Clasico loss; Klopp's critical victory over Pep; How much does Mbappe want to leave PSG?
